author: rickmcguire
msg: GERONIMO-1953 Multiple fixes for uuencode support:
The MimeUtiltiy encode()/decode() method has multiple round trip problems when a uuencode encoding is specified. Among these problems:
1) not properly recognizing the begin marker
2) incorrect end of data marker is written out
4) not properly writing out the second and third bytes of a decoded triplet.
5) a backwards System.arraycopy() munges decoded data.

author: ajith
msg: Added support for passing the namespace to package mapping
1. Added a SWT table to the options page
2. Modified the CodeGenWizard.java to handle the extra parameter
